summary: My first mod. This mod adds a new follower to the game that is in memorial to my pet who died recently and I miss very much. I hope to make this mod very big. I have no real direction for this mod so I want people to suggest ways to improve it in any way (I'm thinking of adding quests but I want good ideas for them)
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]Description[/u][/b]
This mod adds a new follower to the game that is in memorial to my pet who died recently and I miss very much. I hope to make this mod very big. I have no real direction for this mod so I want people to suggest ways to improve it in any way (I'm thinking of adding quests but I want good ideas for them) Seriously, any thing is helpful and if it seems like a good idea or something I want to do I will do it. I hope to make this an ongoing mod as long as I have feedback to work with. My apologies but I haven't been updating in a while and it might be awhile longer. I've been really busy and working on another mod.

[b][u]Who's Dingo?
[/u][/b]In real life, Dingo was a lizard that I owned but died a very tragic death. This mod was created in memorial to him. But he character is an argonian follower without much of a story but there will be soon enough. He isn't overpowered at all and you should be able to use him through an entire play-through if you so choose. He starts at level 3 and progresses to level 80. He doesn't wear overpowered equipment so if you're late game you will need to give him good armor. He is a spell sword type character. He is mostly skilled with light armor, sneak, one-handed weapons, alteration, restoration and destruction. He has a few spells that he can use: firebolt, heal other(don't know how much he uses it,) fast healing, and ironflesh (not used often.) I also gave him the ability to teleport. He won't use it a lot and only uses it to avoid attacks so he'll move just a little bit. You can find him at the Drunken Huntsman.

[b][u]Issues
[/u][/b]I've encountered no issues yet because this is a small mod. Please report any if you find them.

[b][u]Future updates
[/u][/b]In the future, I plan on adding custom voice acting and new quests that will develop the character. These were due to popular suggestions. Keep those suggestions coming!

[u]If you're interested in helping...[/u]
[list][*][size=2]I need a voice actor with a killer Argonian accent[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Anybody with a lot of experience in modding[/size][/*]
[/list]
[b][u]Contact information
[/u][/b]If anybody has some serious suggestions on my mod contact me through the mod page, steam (Flash80cam) or through email (acam.675@gmail.com) [b]NO SPAM PLEASE. Also don't Contact me through the forums because I'm not premium (I know I'm cheap) [/b]
author: Bettter
